question: Recently, the SAARC Disaster Management Centre has been inaugurated at which of the following places in India?
explanation: Recently, Shri Vijaybhai Rupani, Chief Minister of Gujarat inaugurated the SAARC Disaster Management Centre at the Gujarat Institute of Disaster Management (GIDM), Gandhinagar, on May 24, 2017. The setup of the SAARC Disaster Management Centre in India consolidates India's role as first responders in crises and furthers "Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas" policy in external environment especially in the neighbourhood.
